for s in range(24):
    if s < 6:
        self.feat_kernels[s] = embeddings.Sinusoid(91, out_dimension, dtype=torch.float64, device="cuda")
    else:
        self.feat_kernels[s] = embeddings.Sinusoid(3, out_dimension, dtype=torch.float64, device="cuda")
